statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT category, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, category FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Groceries' OR category = 'Utilities';
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, category, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, user_email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, transactions.transaction_id, transactions.amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username='Alice';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, category_name FROM users JOIN categories ON users.user_id = categories.category_id
SELECT user_id, username, date FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE amount < 0
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT t.transaction_id, a.account_name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT u.username, a.account_name, t.amount FROM users u JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id = t.account_id WHERE u.username = 'John'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM accounts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT category_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM categories c JOIN expenses e ON c.category_id = e.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
